name: Kale Ginger Daiquiri
description: When shaken, kale juice makes an especially frothy daiquiri.
recipeYield: makes 1 cocktail, plus extra ginger syrup
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup fresh ginger, peeled and roughly chopped
3/4 ounce fresh lime juice from about 2 limes

recipeInstructions.text: For the Ginger Syrup: Combine the sugar, water, and chopped ginger in a small saucepan over high heat, stirring frequently. Bring to a boil then reduce heat to a simmer for 5 minutes. After 5 minutes, remove from heat and let cool to room temperature. Strain to remove the ginger and refrigerate until cool.

For the Kale Ginger Daiquiri: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add rum, lime juice, ginger simple syrup, and kale juice. Shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into chilled coupe glass and serve immediately.
